# counterSet

**Instance Property**

A GPU device’s counter set instance that you want to sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var counterSet: (any MTLCounterSet)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign this property to one of the counter sets in an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/counterSets] property.

## Configuring a descriptor for a counter sample buffer

- **label**: The name for the counter sample buffer you create with the descriptor.
- **sampleCount**: The number of instances of a counter set’s data that a counter sample buffer can store.
- **storageMode**: The memory storage mode for the counter sample buffers you create with the descriptor.
